trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UICuesEventArgs> specifies which user interface feature changed and its new value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UICuesEventArgs>指定的用户界面功能更改，并且其新值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues> event occurs when the user interface changes by showing or hiding focus indicators or keyboard cues. This is usually when the user presses the TAB, ALT, or F10 keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues>事件用户界面通过显示或隐藏焦点指示器或给键盘提示更改时发生。这通常是当用户按 TAB、 alt 键或 F10 键。

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues>事件。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UICues" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UICues" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UICuesEventArgs" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UICues" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UICuesEventArgs" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UICues" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UICues" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UICues" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UICues" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UICues" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.UICues.Changed" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.UICues.Changed" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the state of the focus cues has changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用以指示焦点提示的状态是否已发生更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the state of the focus cues has changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果焦点提示的状态已发生更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the state of the keyboard cues has changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用以指示键盘提示的状态是否已发生更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the state of the keyboard cues has changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘提示的状态已发生更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether focus rectangles are shown after the change.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用以指示是否在更改后显示聚焦框。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if focus rectangles are shown after the change; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在更改后显示聚焦框，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether keyboard cues are underlined after the change.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用以指示是否在更改后给键盘提示加下划线。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if keyboard cues are underlined after the change; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在更改后给键盘提示加下划线，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
